[
    Token {
        kind: InlineHtml(
            "<h1>\n    ",
        ),
        span: (
            1,
            1,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: OpenTag(
            Full,
        ),
        span: (
            2,
            5,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Echo,
        span: (
            2,
            11,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: LiteralString(
            "Hello, world!",
        ),
        span: (
            2,
            16,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: CloseTag,
        span: (
            2,
            32,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: InlineHtml(
            "\n</h1>",
        ),
        span: (
            2,
            34,
        ),
    },
]
